name: EMITTER
description:
Emitter is a simple premise - fill up the play area with as many colour shapes as possible.

And again.

And again.

And again!

Will you get into the zen of it all and get a higher score than your friends?

Or will you curse your feeble reaction times and give up early?

Fun to compete against friends with!

Controls

Click or Space bar to stop shapes.

Fit as many in as you can!
